post:
That's right, we don't do free trials! But we do have a 14 day money-back guarantee when paying monthly. :)

All Plans include as standard:

* Free Direct Admin license.
* Complimentary DDOS protection

**KVM - 0.5G - NVMe KVM**

* 1 CPU Core (Equal Share - E-2278G)
* 512 MB Ram (DDR4)
* 10 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space (Raid 1)
* 1500 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
_€2.00 /month_

**KVM - 1G - NVMe KVM**

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share - E-2278G)
* 1GB Ram (DDR4)
* 20 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space (Raid 1)
* 3000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
_€2.50 /month_

**KVM - 2G - NVMe KVM**

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share - E-2278G)
* 2 GB Ram (DDR4)
* 30 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space (Raid 1)
* 6000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
_€5.00 /month_

Configurations up to 8GB Ram available.

Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=33

Have a great Tuesday.
